files.code:
+const excludedFiles = [
+  "package.json",
+  "package-lock.json",
+  ".gitignore",
+  /\.md$/,
+];

+      const filteredFiles = commitDetail.files?.filter(
+        (file) =>
+          !excludedFiles.some((excludedFile) =>
+            typeof excludedFile === "string"
+              ? file.filename === excludedFile
+              : excludedFile.test(file.filename),
+          ),
+      );
